name: Cloud Calming
description:
Shoot the clouds to make them all disappear. Avoid the rain, hail and especially the lightening.

  • Clouds morph into angrier clouds.
  • When shot the clouds will morph in reverse, only the small white clouds can be destroyed.
  • A variety of different clouds that will morph / attack in different ways.
  • Play strategically to survive
  • 30 Levels - (duration about 1 hour 45 minutes for 30 levels)
  • Clouds keep popping up for 3 minutes per level. Thereafter you have to clear all of them for the level to end.
  • Three levels of difficulty - cloudy, stormy & cyclone determine.
    • How often it will rain / hail etc.
    • How soon the clouds will morph into angrier clouds.
  • Grab an umbrella when it gets to rough.
  • Random elements will give you a different game every time.
  • Try to beat your own high score (an empty high score table provided).
  • Uses keyboard: arrow keys or WASD and the Space Bar.

System Requirements:

This game was developed in resolution 1920 x 1080. It will create black bars on the top and the bottom of the screen if played on a square monitor.

Tested and working in Windows 10.

Also tested and working on Windows XP 1.7ghz 504mb ram

This game is also available for Android
